name: The Visitor's Passport
data: It increases the users dexterity a good amount.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has little armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'pick locks'.
The holder of the Passport can travel through and over water.
The holder may 'show' the Passport to receive free passage to safety.
